room_title: Escape room "Houdini" by Great Room Escape in Salt Lake City
review: We went for a girls night out and had a blast in the Houdini room! I would definitely recommend this to anyone!

room_title: Escape room "Houdini" by Great Room Escape in Salt Lake City
review: In comparison to other local escape rooms, this one was incredibly detailed. We did the Houdini room and it exceeded our expectations. Staff is awesome and we'll definitely be back for the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Houdini" by Great Room Escape in Salt Lake City
review: Went here for a team building event. My team got the Houdini room. I was impressed with the staff and layout of the room, we had a great time and it definitely makes you think outside the box. We made it out in the nick of time.
